vsParam:
Um... How would other students
cope with such a situation?
You are right... Like Ru Sensei said, no one dares to do it alone...

Ah, Nelke and Anise!
What are you doing?

Ah, guys. Here's the thing, I took the relicology
lesson, and asked Ru Sensei to give me an assignment.

Oh, you went to relicology class as well...
What's the assignment?

Investigating the habits of monsters.
And Sensei asked us to carry out a field investigation...
Er... In this case, there will definitely be a fight.

Yeah. Ru Sensei urged us to
make preparations in advance.

Although I can protect myself with my sword, I'm not sure whether
it's enough to defeat monsters in this world. That makes me nervous...

I've never been good at fighting.
We were discussing how to solve this problem.

I see. In this case,
we can just go with you!

Eh?
This is our assignment, is it OK?
I need to strike down the same monster.

[px] is right. The assignment requires you to investigate the
monster's habits, but it doesn't ask you to fight one!

Exactly. That's how you should reply if Sensei asks!
After all, not everyone can take on a monster-killing assignment.

Um... Please help me with this assignment.
I really appreciate that!

Ha ha! Nelke, don't be so formal!
Let's go together and kill that monster!
Found it! The monster specified in the assignment!
That one... OK, I'm good to go!

Yeah! Let's make it calm down first!
Guys, don't get hurt!

Thank you, guys.
I shall start my observation... Uh!?

Uh—!? I-it just called its buddies!?
We are surrounded! We're through!

C-calm down, Peppermint!
If we kill them one by one...

But, what if they summon more monsters
during the combat!?

Yeah... Looks like the biggest feature of this monster,
is to call its companions by growling!

That's why Ru Sensei warned us.
This would be endless if we kill them one by one...

Look!
There's a monster way bigger than the rest.

Uh, where is it!?
Ah, that one, right?

Yes. This one might be their leader. If we
could strike it down, other monsters will flee!

Anise Hyssop, you provide rear support,
Sorel, use wizardry to obstruct other monsters' actions!
We'll take care of the leader...
That's right! We'll cover you guys!

They want to protect their leader!
Don't even think about it! Sorel, that monster!

[px], Cresson!
Path to the leader! Now!

Phew... W-we made it...
Are you guys hurt?

Just some minor injuries!
I'll treat everyone's wounds!

We couldn't have done it without Nelke.
Even a guard couldn't give such accurate commands!
We'd be dangerous if Nelke weren't here...
No. I'm just a layman with a smattering of it.

Ho ho.
I just did what I can.

So, all credit to you guys.
Thank you!

Ho ho. But, it also demonstrates your fine
judgment and remarkable leadership!

Nelke, you do have the ability to lead.
No everyone can do that!

W-well... Thanks.
I also hope so...

R, right, Anise Hyssop! Don't forget the assignment!
Let's go back and draft the report!

Ha ha, Nelke!
Don't be embarrassed!
